adjectives.description: towering (comparative more towering, superlative most towering)

entries.meaning: Very tall or high, so as to dwarf anything around it.
examples: So this was my future home, I thought! [â€¦] Backed by towering hills, the but faintly discernible purple line of the French boundary off to the southwest, a sky of palest Gobelin flecked with fat, fleecy little clouds, it in truth looked a dear little city; the city of one's dreams.

entries.meaning: The act or condition of being high above others.
examples: But I am an old hawk at the sport; and wrote her such a cool, deliberate, prudent reply, as brought my bird from the aerial towerings, pop down at my foot like Corporal Trim's hat.
